## Statistiques descriptives

# Comparaison hommes/femmes

```{r sexism}

data <- read.csv(file = "DB_binome_2.csv");
n <- nrow(data);
mandata <- c();
womamdata <- c();
for (i in 1:n)
{
  if(data[i, 'Sexe'] == 0)
  {
    mandata <- c(mandata, data[i, 'Peche'])
  }
  else
  {
    womamdata <- c(womamdata, data[i, 'Peche'])
  }
}

boxplot(mandata, womamdata)

```

## Distribution de la pêche en fonction de la tranche d'âge

```{r}
tranches = c(0, 0, 0)
for (i in seq(1, n)) {
    tranche = data[i, "Age"]
    tranches[tranche - 1] = tranches[tranche - 1] + data[i, "Peche"]
}
barplot(tranches)
```

## Intensité du vent

```{r}
vent = c()
for(i in seq(1, n))
{
  vent = c(vent, data[i, "Noeuds"])
}
hist(vent)
```
